title: DAY 15 SILVER BULLET MODEL
description: The Silver Bullet trading model focusing on time windows, structure, and FVG.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• Silver Bullet model components
• Specific time windows for high probability
• Entry requirements: Structure + FVG
• Kill zones explanation
• Model execution requirements
• Time + Liquidity combination

quiz.question: Silver Bullet focuses on:
quiz.explanation: Silver Bullet targets specific high-probability time windows during the trading day.

quiz.question: Entry requires:
quiz.explanation: Valid Silver Bullet entries need both structural confirmation and a Fair Value Gap.

quiz.question: Kill zones provide:
quiz.explanation: Kill zones are specific time periods with high volatility and institutional activity.

quiz.question: Model success requires:
quiz.explanation: The model only works when followed precisely without deviation.

quiz.question: Silver Bullet is based on:
quiz.explanation: Silver Bullet combines time-based analysis with liquidity targeting.
